name: Golp
description:
This is a simple golf game where you have to put a golf ball in to the hole, but even though it's simple this game is still challenging

Complite all levels in a simple and challenging  game

Control is very simple

You just clik left mouse button on game screen and drag to any diraction you want to determine your hit direction and realise left mouse button to hit the ball.

And for mobile you just have to drag you finger on your touch screen realise to hit the ball.

and if you want to pause the game just press esc button for web and window, and for mobile tap on pause button on up right screen

this game was made by Roki  as a Coder, Artist, and Level Design

Sound Effect from: zapsplat.com
